chat_history.message: Hello, My iPhone 13 has the above problem: I don't have a code for my UPS Mybox. Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

the customer has not received the code to pick up the package.

Please contact the carrier to obtain the code.

Thanks for your cooperation

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have contacted the logistics partner regarding this issue and I will update you once we receive the code. Thank you for your patience. 

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

I have attached the POD in this message. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
